attributes.action: reduce the number of scottish and welsh mp's in the house of commons
attributes.additional_details:
Now that the Scottish Parliament and the Welsh Assembly have the chance to influence the policy in their part of the British Isles it is time that their influence in the House of Commons was reduced.The Government should reduce the number MP's from Scotland to 7(representing:Glasgow,Edinburgh,Aberdeen and the four regions (North,South,East and West) and the number from Wales to 6 (representing Cardiff,Wrexham and the four regions (as previous)
This would allow the English MP's to have more influence on policies that effect England and the cost savings could compensate for the running of the bodies in Scotland and Wales
